name: YouTube: Disable Overlays
description:
Disable several items that overlay YouTube videos.
  • Annotations: you know what these are, because the option to turn them off never seems to stay OFF!.
  • Cards: this button and teaser that appears in the upper right corner of videos and displays as a lowercase `i` in a circle.
  • Cross Suggestions: These are the end card overlays that appear during the last few seconds of the video that ask for your subscription or suggest other video.
